page.title: 01Transport Services
page.content: Brighton is a large town requiring lots of transport services. British Rail provides a fast service to and from London for holiday makers and commuters alike. The railway also goes to hastings to the east and Portsmouth to the west. Southdown offers a comprehensive bus service, and they guarantee that you can get from any district in Brighton without changing bus more than once. There is also a shuttle service, where the buses are more frequent but they only fery people to and from set locations. you can telephone a taxi to take you anywhere in Brighton, or catch one from dedicated stations. They cost more than buses, but are more comfortable.
